original: Benktander, Elof Johan, operasångare, musiklärare, Göteborg, f. 17/8/94 i Gbg av skatteuppb :man Anders B. o. Hilda Svensson. G. 23 m. Elin Mannheimer. Barn: Ingrid f. 24, Lars 27, Per 33. — Stud. i Upps., sångutb. f. bl. a. Gillis Bratt i Sthlm o. Bellini i Milano, elev v. Operan, musiklär :ex. 31. Eng. v. Operan 22-24 o. 26-31, v. Stadttheat. i Heilbronn 24-25 o. i Halle 25-26, musiklär. v. Gbgs h. sam-sk. sed. 31. Bl. roller: Figaro, Sarastro i Trollflöjten, Pogner i Mästersångar-na, Hunding i Valkyrian o. Daland i Den flygande holländaren.
translated: Benktander, Elof Johan, opera singer, music teacher, Gothenburg, b. August 17, 1894 in Gothenburg to tax collector Anders B. and Hilda Svensson. Married in 1923 to Elin Mannheimer. Children: Ingrid b. 1924, Lars b. 1927, Per b. 1933. - Studied in Uppsala, vocal training with Gillis Bratt in Stockholm and Bellini in Milan, student of the Opera, received music teaching degree in 1931. Engaged at the Opera from 1922-1924 and 1926-1931, engaged at the Stadttheater in Heilbronn from 1924-1925 and in Halle 1925-1926, music teacher at Gothenburg High School since 1931. Signature roles: Figaro, Sarastro in The Magic Flute, Pogner in The Mastersingers, Hunding in The Valkyrie and Daland in The Flying Dutchman.
